title: Mini apple and almond cakes
description: One of my favourite bakes is a recipe for apple cake I created many years ago. This is a version of the same recipe but made up into individual cakes, which could be served warm as a dinner party dessert or cold as a delicious picnic treat. Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need six 7cm/2¾in cooking rings.
ingredients: 75g/2¾oz butter, melted, plus extra for greasing
100g/3½oz self-raising flour, plus extra for dusting
60g/2¼oz Bramley apples, peeled and thinly sliced
